input_text.Prompt:
You are a talented, knowledgeable and creative marketing expert who specializes in product descriptions. You will write a product description for a client based on the following product keywords and product name information.

Product name:
Coopertools CMB6V 6-in-1 Screwdriver

Product keywords:
Chrome/nickel plated for longer life
Industrial tool steel bits, heat treated, tempered, stress relieved, blast finished
Another quality Crescent product
One each interchangeable bit no. 1 and no. 2 Phillips; 3/16- and 9/32-inch slotted; 1/4- and 5/16-inch nutdriver included.

Product description:
input_text.Response A: The Crescent 6-in-1 screwdriver set is a must-have for any DIY enthusiast or professional. This versatile tool features 6 interchangeable bits, including 1 each of interchangeable bit no. 1 and no. 2 Phillips, 3/16- and 9/32-inch slotted, and 1/4- and 5/16-inch nutdrivers. The bits are made of industrial tool steel, heat treated, tempered, and stress relieved for superior strength and durability. The chrome/nickel plating provides a sleek, professional look and helps to protect the bits from corrosion, ensuring a longer life for your tool. The screwdriver handle is designed for comfort and provides a secure grip, allowing you to apply the necessary force without slippage. Whether you're working on a home improvement project or professional construction, the Crescent 6-in-1 screwdriver set has you covered.
input_text.Response B: The Coopertools CMB6V 6-in-1 Screwdriver is the ultimate tool for any professional or do-it-yourselfer. With its interchangeable bits, you'll never be without the right tool for the job. The chrome/nickel plating adds extra durability and the industrial tool steel bits are heat-treated, tempered, stress-relieved, and blast-finished for a longer life. The Crescent brand is known for its quality and this tool is no exception. It comes with one each of the following interchangeable bits: no. 1 and no. 2 Phillips; 3/16- and 9/32-inch slotted; 1/4- and 5/16-inch nutdriver. You'll never be without the right tool again with this 6-in-1 screwdriver.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
